TopicTitle: Duna SSTV Signal Download!!! [WARNING SPOILER ALERT]

Articles.Content:
Just before you read, to those who have no idea what the strange signal is, here's a quick tutorial on what it is.

There is a pyramid in the northern hemisphere of Duna. If you walk onto this strange pyramid, it will start to give off a weird sound signal. This signal is a SSTV image signal. The sounds can be translated into an image.

How to translate the image:

1. Download the translator - http://users.belgacom.net/hamradio/rxsstv.htm

2. Open it.

3. Use it to translate the sound, have the sound playing while the RX button is pressed.

4. Not working? Well GOOGLE IT!!!

This image download is mainly for those who know how to use the SSTV program and have been needing a download so they could translate it without actually having to go to Duna. As I said this is a spoiler so if you do not want to miss out on the fun of getting there, DO NOT USE THIS!

There is two links to the download. The first one is ADF.LY, it is one of the only ways I can for a MC server I run, but it is optional to use it.

And the other is just a direct link to mediafire.

Adf.ly: [Modedit: Adfly link removed]

Direct: http://www./?pnpl9pnl0p54n86

P.S. USE THE SCOTTY 1 FREQUENCY!!!

Edited May 9, 2015 by technicalfool
Adfly link removed

I just landed a rover near it, and can confirm that this is one of Duna's easter eggs.

However, the one I found in 0.19.1 is in Duna's southern hemisphere.

It also continues to play, even though there are no planets aligned at this time.

This is the landmark to look for. I will not tell you where exactly it is, you're on your own to find it:

Edited May 6, 2013 by OdinYggd
in my version of the game there is no pyramid at the coordinates, i have recorded and decoded the signal.

Wait, you found a beeping hill on the northern hemisphere? Only one I knew of before was in the south. And nova has already said this easter egg is meaningless.. for the moment.. Eventually they plan to have a bunch of clues like this tied together though.

The picture you get, if you are decoding it looks like so> and the pyramid has a line to kerbin (i think) and in the game you see the pyramid is pointing towards kerbin if you are playing 5 kerbal years 5 kerbal days and 5 kerbal minutes.

sorry if my english is bad (i'm from germany)
